EmailTemplate.subject: Did we meet your expectations?

Customer Reference Number {!Case.CaseNumber}
Dear {!Case.Contact},
Thank you for contacting Sutter Shared Services on {!Case.CreatedDate} with regards to {!Case.Sub_Function__c}.
At Sutter Shared Services we strive to improve our services through customer feedback. We invite you to take a short survey to rate your experience.
Please click on the link below to access the online survey:
Survey Link
Your survey will expire on {!Case.Survey_Expiry_Date__c}.
Thank you for your time.
Sincerely,
S3 Leadership Team
___________________________________________________________
Did you know you can reach us online by logging into MySutterConnection to make a request, check the status of your request, or browse knowledge articles? This fast efficient option is available 24 hours a day, 7 days a week.
